posts.post_title: FS: ALL SOLD Assortment of NY Highlanders- SGC, RAW,Rare Backs, Chase, HOFers!
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone, Giving up on this project to buy something that came up! If I am too high on my prices, please make an offer- especially on multiples! Payment options include Paypal Gift and Check (I'll consider others, just ask!) I'll also cover shipping on these (with tracking). PM's and emails (to [url]smanzari1@gmail.com[/url]). Thanks!

Would also Trade for Signed Baseball HOF Plaques that I don't have!

LOT PENDING will also sell individually, prices below.

Raw Cards:
